name: .VEH File Extension
summary: Learn about .VEH files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Vehicle file used by Star Wars Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy, a Star Wars game where the player chooses to have their Jedi character choose the light or dark side path; contains data for vehicles that are accessed throughout the game, such as the different driving capabilities of the vehicle.

content: If you receive an error during gameplay that looks similar to, "Vehicle extensions (.veh) too large," it means that there are too many vehicles for the game to load. To solve this problem, you can remove some of your vehicles in order to be within the game's limit. You can also try a mod that increases the vehicle limit or even removes the limit altogether.
NOTE: Similar to the .VWP file used by Star Wars Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
